title: CliniQuant
specification: CliniQuant is a compact semi-automated biochemistry analyzer for routine clinical chemistry tests. It supports photometric assays, handles common chemistry panels (glucose, urea, creatinine, LFTs), and is suitable for small to medium laboratories requiring reliable throughput with moderate operator interaction.

title: CliniQuant Micro
specification: CliniQuant Micro is a compact, space-saving semi-automated biochemistry analyzer designed for low-to-moderate throughput labs and point-of-care settings. It provides accurate photometric measurements for routine chemistry assays, with simple user interface and small footprint.

title: CliniQuant Micro
specification: CliniQuant Micro (3-unit slab pricing) — compact semi-automated analyzer for routine assays; ideal for small labs requiring multiple low-cost units.

title: CliniQuant Micro
specification: CliniQuant Micro (5-unit slab pricing) — same compact semi-automated analyzer offered in bulk slab for cost-sensitive deployments.

title: Proviso
specification: Proviso is a semi-automated biochemistry analyzer with extended reagent starter kits including HbA1c and CRP. Suitable for clinics requiring a chemistry analyzer plus immunoassay starter capability.

title: CliniQuant Pro
specification: CliniQuant Pro is an upgraded semi-automated analyzer for medium-sized labs offering improved throughput and expanded test menus compared to basic models.

title: CliniQuant Pro
specification: CliniQuant Pro (3-unit slab) — semi-automated analyzer package for medium labs needing multi-system deployment.

title: CelQuant Edge
specification: CelQuant Edge is a 3-part hematology analyzer providing CBC and 3-part WBC differential. Suitable for routine hematology workloads in medium-volume labs.

title: CelQuant Edge
specification: CelQuant Edge (alternate slab) — same 3-part hematology analyzer with different reagent package.

title: CelQuant 3i
specification: CelQuant 3i is a refined 3-part hematology analyzer offering accurate CBC with compact design for medium clinical labs.

title: CliniQuant Micro (Combi Offer)
specification: CliniQuant Micro (Combi Offer) bundles biochemistry capability with promotional pricing for combo configurations. Ideal for labs requiring combined hematology + biochemistry setups.

title: CelQuant Edge (Combi Offer)
specification: CelQuant Edge Combi Offer provides the standard 3-part hematology analyzer bundled with additional reagent sets for combined laboratory packages.

title: CliniQuant Micro (Combi Offer)
specification: CliniQuant Micro (3-unit Combi Offer) provides discounted bulk pricing for labs installing multiple semi-automated chemistry systems as part of a combo package.

title: CelQuant Edge (Combi Offer)
specification: CelQuant Edge (3-unit combo slab) provides hematology analyzers with bundled reagent kits suited for midsize lab deployments.

title: CliniQuant Micro (Combi Offer)
specification: CliniQuant Micro (5-unit combo offer) is designed for large lab setups installing multiple semi-automatic biochemistry units.

title: CelQuant Edge (Combi Offer)
specification: CelQuant Edge (5-unit slab combo) targets large laboratories requiring multiple hematology analyzers with reagent bundles.

title: EIAQuant (with LED)
specification: EIAQuant (LED-based) is an ELISA reader with high-stability optical detection used for HIV, HBsAg, HCV, TFT, and other immunoassay ELISA panels.

title: EIAQuant (with LED)
specification: EIAQuant (3-unit slab) provides discounted multi-unit ELISA reader deployment for diagnostic centers processing moderate to high assay loads.

title: EIAQuant (with LED)
specification: EIAQuant (5-unit slab) is optimized for large diagnostic chains requiring multi-ELISA-reader setups.

title: EIAWash
specification: EIAWash is an ELISA washer unit providing precise wash cycles for microplate assays. Used alongside ELISA readers in immunodiagnostic workflows.

title: EIAWash
specification: EIAWash (3-unit slab) suits medium diagnostic centers requiring multiple ELISA wash stations.

title: AutoQuant 100 Amara
specification: AutoQuant 100 Amara is a fully automated biochemistry analyzer offering random access, high stability photometric measurement, and efficient throughput for medium-scale laboratories. It supports comprehensive clinical chemistry panels with minimal manual intervention.

title: AutoQuant 200 Excelus
specification: AutoQuant 200 Excelus is a fully automated biochemistry analyzer designed for medium to large diagnostic laboratories. It delivers robust photometric performance, improved test throughput, and advanced workflow automation.

title: AutoQuant 200 Excelus (V2)
specification: AutoQuant 200 Excelus (V2) is an upgraded version of the Excelus series offering enhanced automation, better throughput, and extended test menus. Suitable for mid-to-high volume clinical chemistry labs.

title: AutoQuant 400 Supremus
specification: AutoQuant 400 Supremus is a high-throughput, fully automated biochemistry analyzer built for large diagnostics labs. It features advanced automation, high test throughput, and continuous loading capabilities.

title: CelQuant 5 Plus (w/o Autoloader)
specification: CelQuant 5 Plus (without Autoloader) is a 5-part hematology analyzer offering detailed WBC differential, advanced flagging, and reliable CBC reporting for medium-volume labs.

title: CelQuant 5 Plus (with Autoloader)
specification: CelQuant 5 Plus (with Autoloader) is an advanced 5-part hematology analyzer supporting automated sample loading, high throughput CBC analysis, and sophisticated WBC differential reporting.

title: GluQuant A1c
specification: GluQuant A1c is an HPLC analyzer specialized for HbA1c testing, delivering high-precision separation and quantification for diabetes monitoring.

title: ClotQuant - 2
specification: ClotQuant - 2 is a compact coagulation analyzer supporting PT and APTT assays for routine clotting diagnostics in small-to-medium labs.

title: ClotQuant - 2
specification: ClotQuant - 2 (3-unit slab) enables multi-station coagulation testing setups in mid-sized labs.

title: ClotQuant - 4
specification: ClotQuant - 4 is a 4-channel coagulation analyzer supporting PT, APTT, and advanced clotting assays. Ideal for higher-capacity diagnostic labs.

title: Quantilyte
specification: Quantilyte is an electrolyte analyzer measuring Na⁺, K⁺, Cl⁻, and related parameters using ion-selective electrode (ISE) technology. Suitable for hospitals and diagnostics centers.

title: FloQuant
specification: FloQuant is an immunofluorescence analyzer capable of performing rapid diagnostic tests including cardiac markers, thyroid markers, CRP, and fertility assays using fluorescent detection.
